io.doov.core.dsl.field.types

Interface LogicalFieldInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseFieldInfo<java.lang.Boolean>, DslField<java.lang.Boolean>, Readable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanFieldInfo

    public interface LogicalFieldInfo
extends BaseFieldInfo<java.lang.Boolean>
    Base interface for logical field info.

    It contains default methods for common checks, which are calls to methods on BooleanCondition.
